If you didn't hand them out does it mean all your chars just stopped 
in mid sentence and aren't moving. Time for some easy slaggin'.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Im leaving the RPG.  My life is getting busier, it isn't fun 
for me 
> anymore, and i have lost my creative drive.  Any of you may email me 
> privately, whenever you want.  I would love to keep in touch.  I 
will now 
> tell my history here, for those who don't know me as well as others. 
 One 
> day, a year and a half ago, i was on Ben Yee's message board.  I 
came across 
> a post talking about Neo beast Wars RPG.  I had been looking to join 
an RPG, 
> but none of them interested me, until NBW.  When i joined, it was 
just a 
> mailing list.  Every day, people sent posts of the current list of 
members.  
> Eventually, we became part of egroups (now Yahoogroups), and were 
able to 
> gain a much larger amount of members.  When i joined, the council 
was 
> Yanshosh, Kslawdogg, JP3884, and Inferno371.  Soulstice was there 
too, then 
> being called "code," much to his disliking.  The Maximals were led 
by Liono 
> Prime, the Predacons by Hellbeast.  The Alliance was there, but it 
was far 
> smaller.  And so i began my long involvement.  I saw the tide turn 
both ways 
> in the war, and small custom factions spring up and then disapear.  
I saw my 
> fair share of idiots (ahh Icedemon), but there were also some great 
posters.  
> There was Dachande who started the Destrons, Logo, who had the 
hottest female 
> characters ever, my good friend shomin, with his psycho 
religiousness, 
> carnagedarkness, with (his/her? not sure) long, thinky posts with 
Dinobot, 
> and many others.  And let's not forget Minime_316, this RPG's only 
tragedy.  
> For those of you who don't know, Minime overdosed himself with 
pills.  To 
> make matters worse, that bastard JP beleived that the tragic email 
by his 
> brother was fake.  Oh, and KSL, im not angry that your characters 
murdered 
> Soundwave, don't worry about it.  For those that didn't like me, 
well then 
> good for you, but for my friends here, feel free to talk to me 
whenever you 
> want.  I'll always remember Neo Beast Wars RPG.
> 
> Another turning point
> A fork stuck in the road
> Time grabs you by the wrist
>  Directs you where to go
> So make the best of this test and don't ask why
> It's not a question but a lesson learned in time
> It's something unpredictable
> But in the end is right
> I hope you had the time of your life
> 
> So take the photographs and stillframes in your mind
> Hang it on a shelf in good health and good time
> Tattoos of memories and deadskin on trial
> For what it's worth it was worth all the while
> It's something unpredictable
> But in the end is right
> I hope you had the time of your life
> 
> It's something unpredictable
> But in the end is right
> I hope you had the time of your life
> 
> ~Alloran
